author: asianlego
title: Not bad.
review: If you're looking for cool parts to complement UFO or Life on Mars theme, this one is the way to go. I bought mine for about $2 back then. The Cyborg Scout has a blue alien (a robotic style alien), a land vehicle with 3 large barrel wheels, and that's about it.

author: Fauch
title: Nice design
review:
Also it comes with a few nice pieces, 3 big black wheels, some trans green pieces, 2 "guns" (a camera with studs on 4 sides and a piece which was used as a torch in old castle sets) as well as a printed tile with a control panel.

The minifig was very good for 1997, all parts are printed (even legs) and the design is really intricate. No back printing.

This site suggests the price was 3$. This seems low. Nice price if it was the case.
